item.title: CDN: Content Delivery Network
item.description: What is a CDN? It is a service that accelerates internet content delivery to make your website faster. What is the challenge that CDN addresses? For eg: we have software that has users from all around the world, but we don’t have servers all around the world and the experience that those users have due to that dynamic. Let’s understand the problem with an example: I have a simple diagram showing I have a server hosted in Singapore and I have users all around the world.
